Text: Monthly ATC UpdatePST Transmission Customers Transmission Service Offerings are being posted for the month of March to the AP OASIS on January The upload will include ATCs for all valid AP paths AEP PJM VAP FE and DLCO Yearly service that was not given the option to exercise rollover rights on the PJM paths AP to PJM and PJM to AP will be given the option to extend that service through the month of March AP will attempt to call these Transmission Customers by pm EST on January Transmission Marketing will post a message on the OASIS when the ATC upload is started and when it is complete The deadline for reserving March Monthly Transmission Service is on February Transmission service beyond April will continue to be sold by PJM per the Interim Coordination Agreement that was filed with FERC on February If you have any additional questions or concerns please call Transmission Marketing at
